name: MISP Exporter - Custom
author: Nick Driver (@TheDr1ver)
description: Export custom fields from TheHive to MISP the way we want them without recompiling from source.

configurationItems.name: misp_url
configurationItems.description: URL to your MISP instance (e.g. https://misp.example.com)

configurationItems.name: misp_api
configurationItems.description: MISP API key used for exporting this case to an event

configurationItems.name: universal_tag
configurationItems.description: (Optional) A custom tag to apply to every newly created event

configurationItems.name: taxonomy_prefix
configurationItems.description: (Optional) A custom taxonomy prefix to be used when tagging MISP attributes

configurationItems.name: thehive_url
configurationItems.description: URL to your instance of TheHive (e.g. http://hive.example.com:9001)

configurationItems.name: all_observables
configurationItems.description: Send all observables to MISP, regardless of IOC status. 1=True 0=False

configurationItems.name: support_files
configurationItems.description: Send supporting documents uploaded to the case to MISP for context. 1=True 0=False
